rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0001
rows.name: I see... So Nelson's team really[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Still, to think we weren't the only ones
who came to this planet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0003
rows.name: On top of that, they were hostile towards Earthlings.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Maybe they're related to the forces
that dragged Earth into the war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0005
rows.name: Right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'll report to Director General Nagi.
We'll strengthen NLA's defenses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0007
rows.name: By the way[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0008
rows.name: What's that thing? A souvenir?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Looks tasty, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0010
rows.name:
N-No, meh!
Tatsu is not food, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0011
rows.name: Representing Planet Mira[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0012
rows.name:
I came to conclude a Friendship Treaty
with the Earthlings, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0013
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―That seems to be the case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0014
rows.name:
For now, I think we can receive some information
about this planet from him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0015
rows.name: Though I don't know how reliable it'll be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
You can count on Tatsu, meh!
If Tatsu is here, you'll all be safe, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Lin-san, you especially look weak,
Tatsu will stick by you and protect you, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0018
rows.name: Calling me weak, how rude.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0019
rows.name: Besides, why you[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0020
rows.name: decided that you're coming with us!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0021
rows.name: You're staying in NLA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0022
rows.name: Meh-meh?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0023
rows.name:
You leave Tatsu? Here!?
You plan to leave me behind, meh!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0024
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's dangerous outside, and the aliens
who captured you might still be around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0026
rows.name: Staying in NLA is safest for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0027
rows.name: Agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0028
rows.name: Mehmeh! W- Wait a minute, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0029
rows.name: Wi-Without Tatsu, you'll all be in trouble, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0030
rows.name: How so?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0031
rows.name: Th- That's[ST:wide ]― you know, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0032
rows.name:
This planet have many helpful Nopon that Tatsu can talk to.
Other Nopon can share information for friends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0033
rows.name: Well, yeah, true, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0034
rows.name: That's right, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0035
rows.name:
But Nopon are shy,
timid, and difficult to talk with, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0036
rows.name: You will absolutely never get info from them, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0037
rows.name: That's where Tatsu comes in, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0038
rows.name:
With Tatsu's negotiation skills,
talks will go smoothly, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0039
rows.name: He certainly has a point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0040
rows.name: You aren't plotting something, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0041
rows.name:
N-n-no way, meh!
Does Tatsu seem like that, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0042
rows.name: It's a misunderstanding, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Tatsu is a friendly and curious
ordinary Nopon, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0044
rows.name:
"Curoious," huh?
That's your real reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0045
rows.name:
Alright, fine.
At this point, guess it's better than getting nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0046
rows.name: You guys take care of him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0047
rows.name: Huh!? Why us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0048
rows.name: You're the ones who brought him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0049
rows.name:
Besides, do you think you could leave him
with another team?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0050
rows.name:
True[ST:wide ]― He'd probably end up on
the breakfast table tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0052
rows.name: Mehmehmeh?! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0053
rows.name:
From what I see, he seems to get along with Lin too.
Won't you do me a favor?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0054
rows.name: W- Wait! Commander![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0055
rows.name:
How exactly do we look like
we're getting along?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0056
rows.name: Well, I don't really mind, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0057
rows.name: Is that fine with Elma and you too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0058
rows.name: Yes, I have no objection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Alright, it's settled!
Tatsu, was it? We're counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0060
rows.name: Leave it all to Tatsu, meh~[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0061
rows.name: Oh! One thing Tatsu forgot to mention, meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Nopon hate fighting, meh.
Plus, Tatsu is an important Merchant, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0063
rows.name: So protect me well, meh~[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03080100_MSG0064
rows.name:
This guy... earlier he was talking about protecting me,
and now hear this![ST:wait ]
